subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The Pacers, who will be at the Garden for Game 1 against the Knicks on Sunday, are tough, defensive-minded and sometimes a little snarly, like the Celtics.
snippet: The Pacers, who will be at the Garden for Game 1 against the Knicks on Sunday, are tough, defensive-minded and sometimes a little snarly, like the Celtics.
